title: NHL
description:
**** WELCOME TO THE NEW OFFICIAL NHL® APP **** - Watch the final two minutes of each period during every game of the Playoffs (NHL.TV or NHL Premium subscription required; Some round one exclusions apply).
- You can get an in-depth look at every series during the Stanley Cup Playoffs, including upcoming schedule, game results and more. Check out the new Playoffs tab.
- Tilt your phone or tablet to landscape to see the Stanley Cup Playoffs bracket view.
- Customize your default tab when the app opens
- As always, we love hearing from you. Write us at app@nhl.com

**** NHL® App Features ****
• Watch the Free Games of the Week or access your NHL.TV subscription to watch every out-of-market game live and on-demand*
• Leaguewide scoreboard with a new scoring summary carousel and inline video highlights
• Team homepages with individual team scoreboards and complete information such as schedules, news, team statistical leaders, tickets, official merchandise, rosters and social media (phones only)
• Support material design guidelines
• See select key plays and pivotal moments with in-game highlights
• Listen to Home, Away and alternate language (where available) radio broadcasts (no blackout restrictions)
• Live game simulation with active game clock, up-to-the-moment shift changes, boxscores and play-by-play
• Breaking news, schedules, rosters and player stats for every team
• Sortable statistics
• League and Division standings
• Customize the NHL® App home screen to feature your designated favorite team (smartphones only)
• Video library archive, searchable by player, team or keyword
• Customizable push notifications for game start, game end, in-game video highlights, lead changes, goals, team and league news and more
• Video and audio electronic programming guides
• Closed captioning for live video

*All live and on-demand games are subject to blackouts and other restrictions.

You agree to accept the NHL Terms of Service by downloading or using the NHL® App.

If you consent to receive push notifications, you will receive game information, news updates, and other information on your device from the NHL, based on your account settings and preferences, which may be customized on a team or League level. You may withdraw your consent to receive push notifications at any time by disabling the notification or alert type within the Settings section of the App. NHL Interactive CyberEnterprises, LLC, 1185 Avenue of the Americas, New York, NY 10036 | NHL.com.

NHL and the NHL Shield are registered trademarks and NHL.TV are trademarks of the National Hockey League. NHL and NHL team marks are the property of the NHL and its teams. © NHL 2016. All Rights Reserved.
short_desc: The NEW official app of the NHL®.
